name: workspace-electron
//: Recommended electron: 5.0.0-beta.2. Arrow keys for navigating a contextual menu are enabled in electron 5. Registering global shortcuts not working for electron >5.0.0-beta.3 - Issue #17246. App crashes when tray.popUpContextMenu() is called again with context menu open (Windows 10) in electron 5 - Issue #17353
